paragraph__1.content: Thank you for using the MISELL theme. It has a lot of features and options. MISELL gives you the power to configure your store in a countless number of ways. With great power comes great responsibility. Be ready to spend a bit more time to become familiar with MISELL power.

paragraph__2.content: Start at Theme settings. You are currently at Theme settings, review it below.

paragraph__3.content: Continue with Sections. There are multiple types of sections.

paragraph__4.content: a) Dynamic sections - you can add or remove sections for the Home page, e.g.: Builder, Product carousel, Collections, One product. If you need any additional section, please go to Sections -> Add section.

paragraph__5.content: b) Static sections - they are store-wide, e.g.: Header and Footer. Go to the Sections tab.

paragraph__6.content: c) Static sections per page - unique features per page type, e.g.: 'Product Page' and 'Related product carousel' sections for product pages or 'Sidebar' and 'Head' sections for collection pages. !!! _Navigate to page_ !!! and check the Sections tab.

paragraph__7.content: Please note, the list of sections in the Sections tab will be different depending on the current page. You can navigate to a needed page via store preview or using Shopify page type switcher. Please check the [Sections and theme settings](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/theme-settings/sections-and-settings) Shopify help page for more details.

paragraph__8.content: If you want to change a text of any button, checkbox, etc, go to Theme actions -> Edit languages.

paragraph__14.content: Please note, the response time can be up to 1 business day. Theme support does not include Customization services, Installation services.

paragraph__15.content: If you like our theme, please support us with a five stars review at [Misell](https://shop.misell-theme.com/). Thank you :)

purchase_code.label: Purchase code
purchase_code.info: You can find a purchase code at misell-theme  [download](https://shop.misell-theme.com/).

presentation_enable.label: Enable a gear wheel popup (Presentation mode)
presentation_enable.info: Untick this option in real store. This option is only for the demo store.

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)
Select 'Image' if you want to use and download images for logo. Or if you use 'SVG', replace the code in the logo file with yours.

layout_container.label: Default content width
layout_container.info: Applies to header, footer and home page sections. You can overwrite this option at section options.

layout_pagination_type.label: Pagination type
layout_pagination_type.info: Applies only to collection page! Infinite scroll - loads next page content when you scroll to the end of the page. Load more - shows load more button at the end of the page. Classic - shows the list of pages with previous and next links.

layout_enable_rtl.label: Enable RTL
layout_enable_rtl.info: Enable right to left text mode. You may need to switch language at Theme actions -> Edit languages.

layout_images_lazyload.label: Enable images lazyload
layout_images_lazyload.info: Highly recommended option for page speed optimization.

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)

color_collection_item_addtocart_btn_type.label: Collection item Add To Cart button type

color_product_page_addtocart_btn_type.label: Product page Add To Cart button type

paragraph__1.content: All other colors inherit this palette

font_base_apply_to_all.label: Apply font to all elements ignoring everything except alternate font
font_base_apply_to_all.info: Unclick if you want to choose a different font for headings, buttons, inputs or menu

font_size_h1.label: Promo box large text size, h1

paragraph__1.content: You can add the class 'ff-alternative' to any element to apply this font family

collection_sidebar_position.label: Sidebar position on desktop
collection_sidebar_position.info: Configure sidebar position to left, right, top or show the 'Filter' button with slide-out filters popup.

collection_enable_ajax.label: Show filter result on the fly without page reloading (AJAX)

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)
Storewide product options

product_format_pjpg.label: Enable format 'PJPG'
product_format_pjpg.info: Don't work with transparent images. Enable it for better page speed performance.

product_cursor.label: Cursor image
product_cursor.info: Replace the mouse cursor with the image on the product hover on the collection page.

paragraph__1.content: Configure the product variant design. You can show product options as 'Text', 'Large Text', 'Circle color', 'Circle image', 'Square color', 'Square image', or 'Select' - a dropdown list.

product_enable_variants_section.label: Enable 'Product variants' global section for fine-tuning options

product_hide_options_without_availabilit.label: Hide options without availability variants
product_hide_options_without_availabilit.info: Hide out of stock variants. Or show product option as unavailable.

product_collection_set_first_image_by_va.label: Set first image by variant on listing

product_info_set_first_image_by_variant.label: Set first image by variant on product page

product_options_listing_visibility.label: Visibility on listing
product_options_listing_visibility.info: Set number of options to show on collection page. 'Add to cart' button transforms to 'select options' button.

product_variant_change_on_hover.label: Change variants on hover
product_variant_change_on_hover.info: Change product variant on the mouse over. Only for collection item

product_options_type_circle_color.label: Options type 'Circle color'
product_options_type_circle_color.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as circle with color background. Option name should have a [CSS color value](https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_colors.asp). You can configure custom values at Sections -> Product Swatches

product_options_type_circle_image.label: Options type 'Circle image'
product_options_type_circle_image.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as circle with image. You should configure images per each product variant.

product_options_type_square_color.label: Options type 'Square color'
product_options_type_square_color.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as square with color background.

product_options_type_square_image.label: Options type 'Square image'
product_options_type_square_image.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as square with image.

product_options_type_select.label: Options type 'Select'
product_options_type_select.info: Separator is '|'. Show product option as drop-down list.

product_options_type_large_text.label: Options type 'Large text'
product_options_type_large_text.info: Separator is '|'. Show option as bigger text.

product_collection_image_height_percent.label: Image height (in % of the width)
product_collection_image_height_percent.info: 100 - square image. Less than 100 - landscape. More than 100 - portrait. Doesn't work for 'Image resize = Auto'.

paragraph__1.content: Auto - if you choose this option, ignore the previous option of the image height (in % of the width). The image container and the image size are generated based on source image dimensions.

paragraph__2.content: Contain - CSS object-fit = contain. If you choose this option, the image will look like: [object-fit demo](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/object-fit).

paragraph__3.content: Cover - CSS object-fit = cover. If you choose this option, the image will look like [object-fit demo](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/object-fit).

paragraph__4.content: Stretch by width - in this option, the image width fits the container width. It is centered vertically. If the image height is more than the container, cut the image from the top and the bottom. If the image height is less than the container, add white space at the top and the bottom of the image.

paragraph__5.content: Stretch by height - in this option, the image height fits the container height. The image is centered horizontally.

product_replace_images_hover.label: Show second images on hover
product_replace_images_hover.info: Show second product image on mouse over

product_collection_centered_info.label: Centered information
product_collection_centered_info.info: Center product information under the image.

product_collection_more_info_type.label: Show product type, vendor or collections before title

product_collection_show_reviews.label: Show product reviews
product_collection_show_reviews.info: You have to install product reviews app. At our demo, we use a free [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app

product_info_layout.label: Layout
product_info_layout.info: 'Sheet gallery' and 'Gallery by grid' layouts automatically activate sticky block with information. You can also choose a layout by adding a tag with a layout number to the product as "gallery-layout-2".

product_info_enable_fullscreen_popup.label: Enable fullscreen gallery popup
product_info_enable_fullscreen_popup.info: Opens by clicking on the gallery

product_info_gallery_height_and_size_pat.label: Set image height and size from
product_info_gallery_height_and_size_pat.info: This option is for easier or more flexible to customize the image on the collection page and product page. By default for both pages the parameters are taken from the setting Product -> Collection Page -> Image

product_info_gallery_height_percent.label: Gallery images height
product_info_gallery_height_percent.info: 100 - square image. Less than 100 - landscape. More than 100 - portrait. Doesn't work for 'Image resize = Auto'.

paragraph__1.content: Details for this option described in Product -> Collection Page -> Image

paragraph__2.content: You have to install product reviews app. At our demo, we use a free [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app

paragraph__3.content: Located in the "Buttons and quantity" block

product_stock_countdown_min.label: Stock countdown min value
product_stock_countdown_min.info: Set the boundary value for 'Hurry! Only XX Left in Stock!'

paragraph__4.content: Configure options for 'Order in the next XX hours to get it by YY date' block

product_delivery_countdown_reset_time.label: Hours of the day to reset delivery countdown

product_delivery_countdown_delivery_time.label: Average delivery time of delivery countdown (days)

product_info_styled_dynamic_checkout.label: Custom style for dynamic checkout button

product_info_show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
product_info_show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

product_info_complementary_products_add_.label: Show add to cart instead of quick view

product_footbar_show_reviews.label: Show product reviews
product_footbar_show_reviews.info: You have to install product reviews app. At our demo, we use a free [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app

product_quick_view_layout.label: Layout
product_quick_view_layout.info: This option inherits by default the layout's global setting at the beginning of the "Product Page and Quick View" section. you can set a different value for the quick view popup. 'Sheet gallery' and 'Gallery by grid' layouts automatically activate sticky block with information.

search_show.label: Show search in header and navigation popup

search_predictive_enabled.label: Enable product suggestions
search_predictive_enabled.info: Default search does not support all languages. Turn off this option to switch to a simplified search type. [List of supported languages](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/ajax-api/reference/predictive-search)

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)

By default theme shows currencies configured at [Shopify Payments](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency). If you want to show unsupported currencies by Shopify Payments - enable the info currency conversion below.

price_show_sale_separator.label: Show sale price separator 'from'. Example: 120$ from 100$

show_multiple_currencies.label: Enable legacy method of the currency conversion
show_multiple_currencies.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

supported_currencies.label: Supported
supported_currencies.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

cart_ajax.label: Add to cart and stay on the page (AJAX)
cart_ajax.info: Untick to redirect to the cart page.

cart_free_shipping_value.label: Free shipping value
cart_free_shipping_value.info: Set a free shipping limit in cents. If you offer free shipping on orders more than 50 USD, set 5000 here. If you want to set values for different currencies use the separator "|"

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)
Configure options for product compare popup.

compare_description_max_size.label: Maximum number of characters in the description

paragraph__1.content: List the icons to display. Clear the field to show store defaults

paragraph__2.content: Separator is ','. Example and complete list of icons:

payment_images.label: Images shortcode
payment_images.info: You can add a image instead of an icon using the format: afterpay[image_url], visa[image_url]

social_share_image.label: Image
social_share_image.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.

paragraph__1.content: Turn on the option 'Show social share buttons' in the 'Theme settings -> Product Page and Quick View' to show the buttons on the product page.

subscription_method.label: Subscription method
subscription_method.info: Shopify (default) subscribers will be added to your “accepts marketing” [customer list.](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

subscription_mailchimp_form_action.label: MailChimp URL
subscription_mailchimp_form_action.info: [Where to get MailChimp form action URL?](https://mailchimp.com/)

buttons_animation_icon_enable.label: Enable animation for icons on the 'Add to cart',  'Add to compare', and 'Add to wishlist' buttons hover

button_add_to_cart_animation_enable.label: Enable 'Shake' animation for the 'Add to cart' button on the Product Page

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)

Our recommendations: 1) track all your custom changes which you apply to the theme. It will help you greatly in the future theme update. (We recommend GIT), 2) keep your changes as separately as you can. Next two options is a good example how to keep CSS and JS code separately.

dev_enable_custom_css.label: Enable custom CSS file
dev_enable_custom_css.info: Add your custom CSS style to a separate file. Rename custom-example.css file to custom.css.

dev_enable_custom_js.label: Enable custom JavaScript file
dev_enable_custom_js.info: Add your custom JavaScript code to a separate file. Rename custom-example.js file to custom.js

link.label: Link
link.info: You can also add a link to the collection + filter by brand. You need to set up filters in the Navigation -> [Filters](/admin/menus) for link filtering to work. Link format: {collection link}?filter.p.vendor={Brand})

paragraph__1.content: [Read user manual](https://misell-theme.com/manual/)

You can add sections "Heading" and "Banner Builder" for the header of the collection pages and for the banners. To do this, select the "Add section -> Collection page heading" or "Add section -> Collection banner builder" section on this page.

paragraph__2.content: Attention! After making changes in this section, press the "Save" button in the admin panel to see the "Heading" and "Banner Builder" sections if these sections have been added to the page.

enable_default_filtering.label: Enable default filtering
enable_default_filtering.info: Or turn off filtering by default and turn on filtering by tags if this option is disabled.

paragraph__3.content: [Customize filters](/admin/menus) in the admin panel and add a block to "Add block -> Filters" to show the filters. These settings apply only to the "Filters" block.

show_filter_product_count.label: Show the count of products on the filter

hide_disabled_filters.label: Hide disabled filters
hide_disabled_filters.info: Or show and mark as unavailable if this option is disabled

make_availability_as_rounded.label: Make availability filter as rounded checkbox

price_filter_type.label: Price filter type
price_filter_type.info: If the "Theme settings -> Currency -> Enable legacy method of the currency conversion" option is enabled then only the "Slider" option is available

paragraph__4.content: Default value get from collection setting

paragraph__5.content: The buttons dynamically change their availability and remember the selected state at different screen widths. Resize your browser window from small to large to see all available buttons.

enable_grid_tooltip.label: Enable tooltips
enable_grid_tooltip.info: Don't forget to enable tooltips for the whole theme for this option to work. Theme settings -> Animations -> Tooltips

header__5.content: Current filters over the products grid

default_state.label: Default state
default_state.info: If the "Theme settings -> Sidebar position on desktop -> Top & vertical filters" option is selected, only the "Open" and "Close" options are available

show_collection_product_count.label: Show the count of products on the collection

paragraph__1.content: The block is always hidden if there are no active filters. Start filtering to see this block.

show_group.label: Show current filters group
show_group.info: Groups are shown if there is more than 1 group type in active filters. For example: Color and Price

paragraph__1.content: This block will be shown if the "Product grid -> Filtering -> Enable default filtering" option is enabled.

default_state.label: Default state
default_state.info: If the "Theme settings -> Sidebar position on desktop -> Top & vertical filters" option is selected, only the "Open" and "Close" options are available

max_column_size.label: Max column size
max_column_size.info: Only for setting "Layout: 2 or 3 columns ". 0 is infinite

make_as_color.info: Make sure the values for this filter are colors.

paragraph__1.content: This block will be shown if the "Product grid -> Filtering -> Enable default filtering" option is disabled.

paragraph__2.content: Attention! The tag does not work in conjunction with filters! We recommend using the new version of the filter and the "Filters" block!

default_state.label: Default state
default_state.info: If the "Theme settings -> Sidebar position on desktop -> Top & vertical filters" option is selected, only the "Open" and "Close" options are available

show_checkbox.label: Show checkbox area
show_checkbox.info: If this option is disabled, then the "Make tag as color circle" option is not available for activation

make_as_color.label: Make tag as color circle
make_as_color.info: If this option is enabled, you must manually enter the names of the tags that you want to display in the "Tags list" field. For example: Red

tags_list.label: Tags list
tags_list.info: Break the line to separate tags. Clear the field to automatically show all available tags on the collection.

max_column_size.label: Max column size
max_column_size.info: Only for setting "Layout: 2 or 3 columns ". 0 is infinite

for_collections.info: Separator is ','. Example: mens,womens,accessories. Default - for all collections

sidebar.info: Settings for the sidebar in the Product pages -> Sections -> 'Product page' section

show_tab_reviews.info: Be sure you configure the reviews app at the Theme settings -> Reviews.

scrolling_to_opened_tab.label: Scrolling to opened tab
scrolling_to_opened_tab.info: Only for vertical tabs on desktop and on mobile tabs

tabs_type.label: Tabs type
tabs_type.info: In this section you can select one of the options: "Default tabs" or "Sheet of tabs". Once you select the option "Sheet of tabs" the Reviews and Description blocks will be displayed without a tab, but all other tabs will be hidden using this combination.

paragraph__1.content: Click '+ Add block' to add content or tabs or content for sidebar
You can configure this block in more detail in the section "Theme settings -> Product page & Quick view -> Reviews"
You can configure this block in more detail in the section "Theme settings -> Product page & Quick view -> Product details"

search_show_only_products.label: Show only products
search_show_only_products.info: Remove pages and blog articles from search results.

paragraph__1.content: [Customize filters](/admin/menus) in the admin panel and add a block to "Add block -> Filters" to show the filters. These settings apply only to the "Filters" block.

show_filter_product_count.label: Show the count of products on the filter

hide_disabled_filters.label: Hide disabled filters
hide_disabled_filters.info: Or show and mark as unavailable if this option is disabled

make_availability_as_rounded.label: Make availability filter as rounded checkbox

price_filter_type.label: Price filter type
price_filter_type.info: If the "Theme settings -> Currency -> Enable legacy method of the currency conversion" option is enabled then only the "Slider" option is available

paragraph__2.content: Default value get from collection setting

paragraph__3.content: The buttons dynamically change their availability and remember the selected state at different screen widths. Resize your browser window from small to large to see all available buttons.

enable_grid_tooltip.label: Enable tooltips
enable_grid_tooltip.info: Don't forget to enable tooltips for the whole theme for this option to work. Theme settings -> Animations -> Tooltips

header__4.content: Current filters over the products grid

paragraph__1.content: The block is always hidden if there are no active filters. Start filtering to see this block.

show_group.label: Show current filters group
show_group.info: Groups are shown if there is more than 1 group type in active filters. For example: Color and Price

paragraph__1.content: This block will be shown if the "Search page -> Filtering -> Enable default filtering" option is enabled.

default_state.label: Default state
default_state.info: If the "Theme settings -> Sidebar position on desktop -> Top & vertical filters" option is selected, only the "Open" and "Close" options are available

max_column_size.label: Max column size
max_column_size.info: Only for setting "Layout: 2 or 3 columns ". 0 is infinite

make_as_color.label: Make as color circle

max_column_size.label: Max column size
